### Hello! ðŸ‘‹

I'm Kim, a programmer focussing on developing software for scientific computations. I'm currently a PhD student at the University of Groningen in the group of Thomas la Cour Jansen. My goal is to combine computational efficiency with program versatility and user friendliness.
